ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming in the outdoors
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe  you can charm up to 5 levels above you.  Even with 200 charisma you would hit the 6 level cap.  The 37th level cap is just the max that the SONG can
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe you can charm up to 5 levels above you. Even with 200 charisma you
would hit the 6 level cap. The 37th level cap is just the max that the SONG
can charm. You can only charm about 5 levels above you (and only about 3
levels above reliably)

Hope that helps! And 133 charisma should be fine. I can even pull it off
with 120 (though at 130 there seems to be a bonus kicker because it gets
dramatically more reliable at 132 vs 120)

At any rate, yah you should be fine, but you can't charm level 37 mobs at
level 27 ;) hehe most you'll be able to do reliably will be level 30
(sometimes 31 and 32)

Kev
----- Original Message -----
From: "Gordon Hughes" <ghughes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 2:28 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Charming in the outdoors


> I'm a couple of levels away from getting Charm. With a Charisma of 133 (I
> was one of those that pumped all my points into STR and DEX) should I be
> able to charm mobs higher than me up to the level 37 cap?
>
> -KS
